에픽 특기

EPIC FEATS

에픽 특기 획득하기

ACQUIRING EPIC FEATS

Characters gain 에픽 특기 in the following ways:

At 21st 레벨, and every three 레벨 thereafter, the character may select an 에픽 feat in place of a nonepic feat.

Each character class gains 보너스 에픽 특기 according to the class 묘사. These 특기 must be selected from the list of 보너스 에픽 특기 for that class.

전제조건

PREREQUISITES

Most 에픽 특기 have 전제조건. A character must have the listed ability score, feat, skill, class feature, or base 공격 수정치 in order to select or use that feat. A character can gain an 에픽 feat at the same 레벨 at which he or she gains the prerequisite, just as with regular 특기. A prerequisite expressed as a numerical value is a minimum; any value higher than the one given also meets the prerequisite. A character can’t use an 에픽 feat if he or she has lost a prerequisite.

에픽 특기의 유형

TYPES OF EPIC FEATS

Most 에픽 특기 are general, meaning that no special rules govern them as a group. Others may be 아이템 제작 특기 or 메타마법 특기, which follow all the normal rules for such 특기, except as specified in the feat’s 묘사. In addition, some 특기 are defined as 신성 특기 or as 야생 특기. Such 특기 are described below.

신성 특기

DIVINE FEATS

특기 in this category share a few characteristics. First, they all have as a prerequisite the ability to turn (or, in most cases, rebuke) undead. Thus, they are open to 사제, 성기사 of 4 레벨 이상, and any prestige class that has that ability. (An ability to turn other creatures does not qualify a character to select one of these 특기.) Second, the force that powers a 신성 feat is the ability to channel positive or negative energy to 언데드 퇴치. Each use of a 신성 feat costs the character one turn/rebuke attempt from his or her number of attempts each day. If a character doesn’t have any turn/rebuke attempts left, he or she can’t use the feat. Since turning or rebuking is a standard action, activating any of these 특기 is also a standard action.

야생 특기

WILD FEATS

특기 in this category share the characteristic of relating to the ability to use wild shape as a 드루이드. These 특기 require the character to have the ability to use wild shape before acquiring the feat.

에픽 사이오닉 특기

EPIC PSIONIC FEATS

Psionic characters can acquire 에픽 “psionically flavored” 특기.  Some 특기 require so much translation that converted 특기 are provided. Whenever a feat concerns conferring or altering a spell in some fashion, some translation must be done to use it with 사이오닉. Sometimes this translation is as straightforward as changing a few 이름. Translating 에픽 메타마법 특기 to 에픽 메타사이오닉 특기 requires that 주문학 전제조건 be replaced with 사이크래프트. It also requires a little math—instead of casting a spell at a higher 레벨, a psionic character pays more 파워 포인트. For every spell slot one 레벨 higher than the spell’s actual 레벨 메타마법 feat requires, the metapsionic feat requires a character to pay a power point cost equal to its standard cost +2. Likewise, when a feat allows a spellcaster to “pay” one less 레벨 to use a 메타마법 feat, the psionic version allows a character to pay 2 파워 포인트 less for a given metapsionic feat.

특기

FEATS

추가 마법 아이템 공간 [에픽]

ADDITIONAL MAGIC ITEM SPACE [EPIC]

Benefit: Choose one type of magic item that has a limit on the number a character can simultaneously wear and gain its benefit. The character can now wear one more magic item of this type and also gain its benefit.

Normal: Without this feat, a character is limited to one headband, hat, or helmet; one pair of eye lenses or goggles; one cloak, cape, or mantle; one 아뮬렛, brooch, medallion, necklace, periapt, or scarab; one suit of 갑옷; one robe; one vest, vestment, or shirt; one pair of bracers or bracelets; one pair of gloves or gauntlets; two 반지; one belt; and one pair of boots.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time the character takes the feat, it applies to a new type of wearable magic item.

갑옷 피부 [에픽]

ARMOR SKIN [EPIC]

Benefit: The character gains a +1 natural 갑옷 보너스 to 방어도, or his or her existing natural 갑옷 보너스 increases by 1.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

증강 연금술 [에픽]

AUGMENTED ALCHEMY [EPIC]

전제조건: Int 21, 제작(alchemy) 24 ranks.

Benefit: Whenever creating an alchemical item or substance, the character can choose to make it more powerful than normal by adding +20 to the DC required to create it and 곱하기 its price by 5. If the item or substance deals 피해, double 피해 dealt. If the item or substance doesn’t deal 피해, double 지속시간 of its effect. If the item or substance doesn’t deal 피해 and doesn’t have a specific listed 지속시간(or has an instantaneous 지속시간), double all dimensions of its 범위. If the item or substance doesn’t fit any of these categories, then it cannot be affected by this feat. See 제작(alchemy) skill 묘사.

자동 빠른 주문 [에픽]

AUTOMATIC QUICKEN SPELL [EPIC]

전제조건: 빠른 주문, 주문학 30 ranks, ability to cast 9th-레벨 arcane or 신성 주문.

Benefit: The character may cast all 0-, 1st-, 2nd-, and 3rd-레벨 주문 as quickened 주문 without using higher-레벨 spell slots. The normal limit to the number of quickened 주문 a character may cast per round applies. 주문 with a 시전 시간 of more than 1 full round can’t be quickened.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time a character takes the feat, 주문 of his or her next three lowest spell 레벨 can now be quickened with no adjustment to their spell slots. This feat doesn’t increase 시전 시간 for those 주문 that normally become 전체 라운드 행동 when cast in 메타마법 form.

자동 주문 암송 [에픽]

AUTOMATIC SILENT SPELL [EPIC]

전제조건: 주문 암송, 주문학 24 ranks, ability to cast 9th-레벨 arcane or 신성 주문.

Benefit: The character may cast all 0-, 1st-, 2nd-, and 3rd-레벨 주문 as 주문 암송 without using higher-레벨 spell slots.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time a character takes the feat, 주문 of his or her next three lowest spell 레벨 can now be silenced with no adjustment to their spell slots. This feat doesn’t increase 시전 시간 for those 주문 that normally become 전체 라운드 행동 when cast in 메타마법 form. However, since 음유시인 주문 can’t be enhanced with 주문 암송 feat, they can’t be affected by this feat either.

자동 부동 주문 [에픽]

AUTOMATIC STILL SPELL [EPIC]

전제조건: 부동 주문, 주문학 27 ranks, ability to cast 9th-레벨 arcane or 신성 주문.

Benefit: The character may cast all 0-, 1st-, 2nd-, and 3rd-레벨 주문 as stilled 주문 without using higher-레벨 spell slots.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time a character takes the feat, 주문 of his or her next three lowest spell 레벨 can now be stilled with no adjustment to their spell slots. This feat doesn’t increase 시전 시간 for those 주문 that normally become 전체 라운드 행동 when cast in 메타마법 form.

적의 파멸 [에픽]

BANE OF ENEMIES [EPIC]

전제조건: 생존 24 ranks, five or more favored enemies.

Benefit: Any weapon the character wields against one of his or her favored enemies is treated as a 파멸 weapon for that creature type (thus, its enhancement 보너스 is increased by +2 and it deals +2d6 points of 피해). This ability doesn’t stack with similar 능력.

실명의 속도 [에픽]

BLINDING SPEED [EPIC]

Prerequisite: Dex 25.

Benefit: The character can act as if hasted for 5 rounds each day. The 지속시간 of the effect need not be consecutive rounds. Activating this power is a free action.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time he or she takes the feat, it grants an additional 5 rounds of 가속 per day.

보너스 계열 [에픽]

BONUS DOMAIN [EPIC]

전제조건: Wis 21, ability to cast 9th-레벨 신성 주문.

Benefit: Choose an additional domain from the character’s deity’s domain list. The character now has access to that domain’s 주문 as normal for his or her domain 주문 and the domain’s granted powers.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time he or she takes the feat, it applies to a different domain.

방어의 보호자 [에픽]

BULWARK OF DEFENSE [EPIC]

전제조건: Con 25, defensive stance 3/일.

Benefit: The character’s defensive stance 보너스 increase to +4 근력, +6 건강, +4 저항 보너스 on all 내성 굴림, and +6 회피 보너스 to AC.

혼돈의 격노 [에픽]

CHAOTIC RAGE [EPIC]

전제조건: 격노 5/일, chaotic 성향.

Benefit: Any weapon the character wields while in a 격노 is treated as an anarchic weapon (it is chaos-aligned and deals an extra 2d6 points of 피해 against creatures of lawful 성향). This ability does not stack with similar 능력.

초거대 야생 형태 [야생][에픽]

COLOSSAL WILD SHAPE [WILD][EPIC]

Prerequisite: The ability to wild shape into a Gargantuan creature.

Benefit: The character can use his or her wild shape to take the shape of a Colossal animal.

Normal: Without this feat, a character cannot wild shape into an animal of 상급 than Huge size.

전투 궁술 [에픽]

COMBAT ARCHERY [EPIC]

전제조건: 회피, 기동성, 영점 사격.

Benefit: The character does not incur any 기회 공격 for firing a bow when threatened.

Normal: Without this feat, a character incurs an 공격 of opportunity from all opponents who threaten him or her whenever he or she uses a bow.

에픽 마법 무기와 갑옷 제작 [아이템 제작][에픽]

CRAFT EPIC MAGIC ARMS AND ARMOR [ITEM CREATION][EPIC]

전제조건: 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작, 지식(arcana) 28 ranks, 주문학 28 ranks.

Benefit: The character can 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작 which exceed the normal limits for such items

에픽 마법봉 제작 [아이템 제작][에픽]

CRAFT EPIC ROD [ITEM CREATION][EPIC]

전제조건: 마법봉 제작, 지식(arcana) 32 ranks, 주문학 32 ranks.

Benefit: The character can 마법봉 제작 that exceed the normal limits for such items.

에픽 마법지팡이 제작 [아이템 제작][에픽]

CRAFT EPIC STAFF [ITEM CREATION][EPIC]

전제조건: 마법지팡이 제작, 지식(arcana) 35 ranks, 주문학 35 ranks.

Benefit: The character can 마법지팡이 제작 that exceed the normal limits for such items.

에픽 고급 아이템 제작 [아이템 제작][에픽]

CRAFT EPIC WONDROUS ITEM [ITEM CREATION][EPIC]

전제조건: 고급 아이템 제작, 지식(arcana) 26 ranks, 주문학 26 ranks.

Benefit: The character can 고급 아이템 제작 that exceed the normal limits for such items.

피해 축소 [에픽]

DAMAGE REDUCTION [EPIC]

Prerequisite: Con 21.

Benefit: The character gains 피해 축소 3/–. This does not stack with 피해 축소 granted by 마법 아이템 or nonpermanent magical effects, but it does stack with any 피해 축소 granted by permanent magical effects, 직업 특성, or this feat itself.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Each time he or she gains the feat, his or her 피해 축소 increases by 3.

귀청 터질 듯한 노래 [에픽]

DEAFENING SONG [EPIC]

전제조건: 공연 24 ranks, bardic music class feature.

Benefit: The character can use song or poetics to temporarily deafen all enemies within a 30-foot spread from him or her. A successful Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 the character’s class 레벨 + the character’s 매력 수정치) negates the effect. The deafening effect lasts for as long as the character continues 귀청 터질 듯한 노래. The character can choose to exclude any characters from this effect. The character may sing, play, or recite a 귀청 터질 듯한 노래 while taking other mundane actions, but not magical ones (see 음유시인’s inspire courage ability for more details). The character may keep up 귀청 터질 듯한 노래 for a maximum of 10 rounds. Using 귀청 터질 듯한 노래 counts as one of the character’s uses of song or poetics for the day.

적의 죽음 [에픽]

DEATH OF ENEMIES [EPIC]

전제조건: 적의 파멸, 생존 30 ranks, five or more favored enemies.

Benefit: Any time the character scores a critical hit against one of his or her favored enemies, it must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 character’s 레인저 class 레벨 + character’s 지혜 수정치) or die instantly.

Special: Creatures immune to critical hits can’t be affected by this feat.

통렬한 치명타 [에픽]

DEVASTATING CRITICAL [EPIC]

전제조건: Str 25, 쪼개기, 상급 쪼개기, 향상된 치명타(chosen weapon), 압도하는 치명타(chosen weapon), 강한 공격, 무기 집중(chosen weapon).

Benefit: Whenever the character scores a critical hit with the chosen weapon, the target must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 character 레벨 + character’s 근력 수정치) or die instantly. (Creatures immune to critical hits can’t be affected by this feat.)

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time a character takes the feat, it applies to a different type of weapon.

비상한 인내력 [에픽]

DEXTEROUS FORTITUDE [EPIC]

전제조건: Dex 25, slippery mind class feature.

Benefit: Once per round, when targeted by an effect that requires a Fortitude 내성 굴림, the character may make a Reflex save instead to avoid the effect (evasion is not applicable).

비상한 의지 [에픽]

DEXTEROUS WILL [EPIC]

전제조건: Dex 25, slippery mind class feature.

Benefit: Once per round, when targeted by an effect that requires a Will 내성 굴림, the character may make a Reflex save instead to avoid the effect (evasion is not applicable).

아주 작은 야생 형태 [야생][에픽]

DIMINUTIVE WILD SHAPE [WILD][EPIC]

Prerequisite: Ability to wild shape into a Huge animal.

Benefit: The character can use wild shape to take the shape of a Diminutive animal.

Normal: Without this feat, a character cannot wild shape into an animal of smaller than Tiny size.

흉폭한 돌격 [에픽]

DIRE CHARGE [EPIC]

Prerequisite: 향상된 선제권.

Benefit: If the character 돌격 a foe during the first round of 전투(or 기습 round, if the character is allowed to act in it), he or she can make a 전력 공격 against the opponent charged.

Normal: Without this feat, a character may only make a single 공격 as part of a 돌격.

원거리 사격 [에픽]

DISTANT SHOT [EPIC]

전제조건: Dex 25, 원거리 사격, 영점 사격, 감지 20 ranks.

Benefit: The character may throw or fire a ranged weapon at any target within line of sight, with no 페널티 for 거리.

드래곤 야생 형태 [야생][에픽]

DRAGON WILD SHAPE [WILD][EPIC]

전제조건: Wis 30, 지식(nature) 30 ranks, wild shape 6/일.

Benefit: The character may use wild shape to change into a 드래곤(black, 파랑이, green, red, white, brass, bronze, copper, gold, or silver). The size limitation is the same as the character’s limitation on animal size. The character gains all extraordinary and supernatural 능력 of the 드래곤 whose form he or she takes.

효율적인 아이템 제작 [에픽]

EFFICIENT ITEM CREATION [EPIC]

전제조건: Item creation feat to be selected, 지식(arcana) 24 ranks, 주문학 24 ranks.

Benefit: Select an item creation feat. Creating a magic item using that feat requires one day per 10,000 gp of the item’s 시장 가격, with a minimum of one day.

Normal: Without this feat, creating a magic item requires one day for each 1,000 gp of the item’s 시장 가격.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time a character takes the feat, it applies to a different item creation feat.

에너지 저항 [에픽]

ENERGY RESISTANCE [EPIC]

Benefit: Choose a type of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). The character gains 저항 10 to that type of energy, or the character’s existing 저항 to that type of energy increases by 10. This feat does not stack with 에너지 저항 granted by 마법 아이템 or nonpermanent magical effects.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. If the same type of energy is chosen, the effects stack.

주문 증폭 [메타마법][에픽]

ENHANCE SPELL [METAMAGIC][EPIC]

Prerequisite: 주문 최대화.

Benefit: 피해 cap for the character’s 주문 increases by 10 주사위(for 주문 that deal a number of 주사위 of 피해 equal to 시전자 레벨) or by 5 주사위(for 주문 that deal a number of 주사위 of 피해 equal to half 시전자 레벨). An enhanced spell uses up a spell slot four 레벨 higher than the spell’s actual 레벨. This feat has no effect on 주문 that don’t specifically deal a number of 주사위 of 피해 equal to the caster’s 레벨 or half 레벨, even if the spell’s effect is largely dictated by the caster’s 레벨.

Normal: Without this feat, use 피해 주사위 caps indicated in the spell’s 묘사.

Special: A character may gain this feat multiple times. Each time he or she selects this feat, 피해 cap increases by 10 주사위 or 5 주사위, as appropriate to the spell, and the enhanced spell takes up a spell slot an additional four 레벨 higher.

에픽 회피 [에픽]

EPIC DODGE [EPIC]

전제조건: Dex 25, 회피, 재주넘기 30 ranks, improved evasion, defensive roll class feature.

Benefit: Once per round, when struck by an 공격 from an opponent the character has designated as the object of his or her 회피, the character may automatically avoid all 피해 from 공격.

에픽 지구력 [에픽]

EPIC ENDURANCE [EPIC]

전제조건: Con 25, 지구력.

Benefit: Whenever the character makes a check for performing a physical action that extends over a period of time, he or she gets a +10 보너스 on the check.

에픽 지식의 확장 [에픽, 사이오닉]

EPIC EXPANDED KNOWLEDGE [EPIC, PSIONIC]

You learn another power.

전제조건: Character 레벨 21st, ability to manifest powers of the normal maximum power 레벨 in at least one psionic class.

Benefit: You learn one additional power at any 레벨 up to the highest 레벨 of power you can manifest. You can choose any power, even one that is part of another 분야’s list or another class’s list.

Special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time, you learn one new power at any 레벨 up to the highest 레벨 of power you can manifest.

에픽 인내력[에픽]

EPIC FORTITUDE[EPIC]

Benefit: The character gains a +4 보너스 on all Fortitude 내성 굴림.

에픽 영감 [에픽]

EPIC INSPIRATION [EPIC]

전제조건: Cha 25, 공연 30 ranks, bardic music class feature.

Benefit: All 적성 보너스, 회피 보너스, and 의욕 보너스 granted by the character’s bardic music ability increase by +1.  If you have the inspire greatness bardic music ability, it grants one additional 보너스 HD.

Special: A character can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

에픽 지도력 [에픽]

EPIC LEADERSHIP [EPIC]

전제조건: Cha 25, 리더십, 리더십 score 25.

Benefit: The character attracts a cohort and followers as shown below on 표: 에픽 지도력.  In all other ways 에픽 지도력 functions as 리더십 feat.

Normal: 리더십 feat provides no benefit for 리더십 scores beyond 25.

리더십 Score: A character’s 리더십 score equals his or her 레벨 plus any 매력 수정치. Outside factors can affect a character’s 리더십 score, as detailed in 리더십 feat.

Cohort 레벨: The character can attract a cohort of up to this 레벨. Regardless of the character’s 리더십 score, he or she can’t recruit a cohort of his or her 레벨 or higher.

Number of Followers by 레벨: The character can lead up to the indicated number of characters of each 레벨.
